description: Japanese grass sedge (Carex morrowii var. temnolepis 'Silk Tassel') is an amazing ornamental grass for landscaping. This grass can thrive in almost any soil type, and it has an incredible spreading habit that adds texture and color to a garden. It also grows gracefully and gracefully arching out to produce long, thin leaves. The outstanding feature of this grass is its spectacular seed heads, which create a fabulous show of drooping 'silky tassels'. This grass is also low maintenance and drought tolerant, making it a favorite choice of landscapers and gardeners alike.
